data.prayer: Father, help the 44,589 believers in Kurnool to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Kurnool who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Kurnool, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bedar Myasa people.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Kurnool. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 4,008,911 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Kurnool who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.name: Kurnool
location.people_groups_list: Boya, Bedar Kakamundi, Madasi Kuruva, Bedar Kare, Bedar Naik Makkalu
